attributes.action: MAKE PEOPLE ON THE DOLE DO 20 HOURS OF COMUNITY SERVICE (THE STREETS NEED CLEANING YOU KNOW)
attributes.additional_details:
i think the goverment should make everybody who goes on the dole work for there money what is 20 hours per week (nothing i am a 21 year old man and work 45 + hours for my money). We the tax payers are paying all these scum to sit on there arse at home and watch tv its time we all stood up show we are sick of it n to make britan a better place to live

lets make this happen !!
